body:
There have been recent events that concern our former Administrator, ViceWatercolour, also known as ParaSpider. We understand that it has caused confusion, and this thread will address the situation.

Vice had had his Administrator rank removed, due to him ultimately misusing his Administrator permissions.
We won't divulge what exactly happened.

Furthermore, Vice has chosen to retire from the Staff Team completely.

Thank you for your understanding.

Furthermore, Vice has chosen to retire from the Staff Team completely.

Thank you for your understanding.

replies.body:
I was demoted for abuse on the server. Though a thread was made for this, and I still disagree with the decision, I have that right to express my opinion. I was demoted by the senior staff team, and I finished up all my projects in one single TeamSpeak session. The demotion reasons I can explain, however one of them was where I wasn't thinking straight and ended up abusing TeamSpeak permissions, where I got a revocation of my TS Dev rank, and my admin/senior rank. It seems after talking I got my staff rank back (concluded as an accident). Following my demotion, I have retired. The abuse in question was lava'ing a friend only I was with in TeamSpeak (who did not care and played along), another was making a "life support" lounge and "weed lounge", and having fun on an empty walls server with other staff who also abused without penalty. With no staff warns, I was promptly demoted.

As for if I'm leaving, I'm just taking a break. I'm still actively involved in many Avicus projects.
replies.body_tagged:
I was demoted for abuse on the server. Though a thread was made for this, and I still disagree with the decision, I have that right to express my opinion. I was demoted by the senior staff team, and I finished up all my projects in one single TeamSpeak session. The demotion reasons I can explain, however one of them was where I wasn't thinking straight and ended up abusing TeamSpeak permissions, where I got a revocation of my TS Dev rank, and my admin/senior rank. It seems after talking I got my staff rank back (concluded as an accident). Following my demotion, I have retired. The abuse in question was lava'ing a friend only I was with in TeamSpeak (who did not care and played along), another was making a "life support" lounge and "weed lounge", and having fun on an empty walls server with other staff who also abused without penalty. With no staff warns, I was promptly demoted.

As for if I'm leaving, I'm just taking a break. I'm still actively involved in many Avicus projects.
